channel.title: Need help Port Forwarding (Linksys/Cisco)
channel.description:
Can someone please help me ith portforwarding? I need help really bad heres the problem
1. I Watch all kinds of youtube videos and nothing help me I did everthing what they said and nothing 2. After when I port forward it I went to [url=http://www.canyouseeme.org]Open Port Check Tool[/url] and type in 43594 in the port and it said " Error: I could not see your service on (IPADRESS) on port (43594) Reason: Connection refused " I tried everything and nothing work. Can someone please help me fix this error. I do have skype its : xsunnyx484 : Please add me and help me because I'd been trying to host a server for the longest and nothing working. Thanks
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3003017/Untitled.png[/img]

item.title: Need help Port Forwarding (Linksys/Cisco)
item.dc:creator: @nickcheese nickcheese
item.description:
@nickcheese wrote:

I have a linksys, I could not fix mine for years, the final fix was making my IP a static IP. Once I did that they were open and everything. I was so happy. So try making your comp a static IP!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Port Forwarding (Linksys/Cisco)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I love people that blank out their 192.168 ip. We can’t even use it for anything. Every house has it’s own set over 192.168 ip’s.
Mine’s 192.168.0.114
Do what you want xD cause you cant.

Oh, on topic.
You used canyouseeme.org.
Try running your server then checking on it again.

Read full topic

@silverkiller wrote:

Can someone please help me ith portforwarding? I need help really bad heres the problem

  1. I Watch all kinds of youtube videos and nothing help me I did everthing what they said and nothing
  2. After when I port forward it I went to Open Port Check Tool and type in 43594 in the port and it said " Error: I could not see your service on (IPADRESS) on port (43594)
    Reason: Connection refused "
    I tried everything and nothing work. Can someone please help me fix this error. I do have skype its : xsunnyx484 : Please add me and help me because I’d been trying to host a server for the longest and nothing working. Thanks
